p: Given the high infection rate of this virus between humans and its pandemics, it is essential to understand the structure and basis of its pathogenicity for the advancement to the special treatment or the prevention. Due to the greater resemblance of the virus to its families, attempts have been made to expolore the medicines and vaccines for COVID-19. Identification of the specific molecular details of the virus is helpful in achieving treatment goals. It is also important to monitor any changes in phenotype as the virus spreads.
